title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: The checkboxes in the Export Zip feature do not display a busy cursor when updating the checked state of the table.
EB: The checkboxes in the Export Zip feature should display a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Click on Export Zip.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose file types.
5. Click OK.
